commands.name: Select Artboards Containing Selection
commands.description: For each selected layer, selects its containing artboard instead.

commands.name: Rearrange Artboards Into Grid
commands.description: Rearranges artboards on the current page into rows, based on the artboard's current position.

commands.name: Prefix Artboard Names With Numbers
commands.description: Adds number prefixes to artboards on the current page based on their position (best used in conjunction with the Rearrange command).

commands.name: Remove Artboard Number Prefixes
commands.description: Removes number prefixes from artboards on the current page.
